update members set mileage = (select R.* from (select a.mileage + (select c.mileagePlus from bookingPrice c where c.bpnum = #{bpnum}) from members a where a.memberNum = (select b.memberNum from bookingPrice b where b.bpnum = #{bpnum})) R) where memberNum = (select d.memberNum from bookingPrice d where d.bpnum = #{bpnum})
update members set mileage=(select R.* from (select mileage from members where id=#{id}) R)- #{mileage} where id = #{id}
